page.title: 01VILLAGE AMENITIES
page.content: The Village In Which I Live. I live in Harrold; it is a quite a small village but it has quite a few facilities. There are four shops, two in the High Street, down by The Green, and the other two are up at the other end of the High Street.They are all food and general shops, and one of them is a butcher's shop. There are two garages, and two hairdressers, at different ends of the village. I go to a Club for children from 8 to 13 years which is good fun, and it is held in Harrold and in Carlton, a nearby village. Other clubs include the W.I., a tennis club, a cricket club and other associations which are held in The Institute in the High Street.
